title: what champs are good at tanking or countering ap damage?
body:
if teemo can counter  ad from autos what's his ap counterpart?

inb4 downvotes for no reason

replies.body: I mean Galio, but really just adaptive helm is really op against poison and sustained magic damage.
anything who buys a single MR item?

Tanks are designed to counter AP burst damage.

Build MR.

Teemo is largely a cheese pick designed to tilt the enemy top laner. As long as you pick something that scales into late game and hold on until then, you'll be fine for team fights and his team will be screwed

Well, AP is a stat, not a damage type, but silences and spellshields prevent damage from abilities, which generally scale on AP. If the ability uses a projectile, then intercepts will work against it, but those work on projectile-based autoattacks as well. Many abilities are also dodgeable, unlike autoattacks, so mobility can make a big difference.
galio and mundo are specifically anti ap champions.
